jobs.title: Junior System Administrator
jobs.description: Assist with troubleshooting issues and provide technical support to over 150+ users across multiple US time zones virtually, enhancing user productivity and satisfaction. Support the IT team in maintaining hardware, software, and other systems, ensuring smooth operation and minimizing downtime. Organize and maintain IT resources, ensuring efficient utilization and accessibility.

jobs.title: Junior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Developed and delivered robust production code for a wide array of projects, including both frontend clients and backend services. Collaborated with designers and other engineers to ensure thoughtful and consistent user experiences for Upwards' apps.

jobs.title: Technical Intern
jobs.description: Installed and maintained hardware components of Point-of-Sale systems and credit card terminals. Collaborated in a team to analyze and troubleshoot product issues, delivering effective customer service.

jobs.title: Projects
jobs.description: Independently built a web application that allows users to create personalized swim workouts and track USA swimming event standards. Front and back-end development using React and Node.js/Express.js respectively and utilizing AWS RDS host a MySQL database. Utilized JWT and cookies to implement user authentication and authorization best practices. Beta users can register using the key - Beta123
